data.text: @GeorgeGammon Goebbels:  So we're expected to believe the Russians are kicking our asses with tons of tanks and men but also have almost no food or supplies and have to pick up their fallen comrade's rifles to use?  Well which is it, Allies?!
@GeorgeGammon George Gammon you are way to intelligent to fall for this . Do you seriously expect the same media that has lied to us for more than 2 years to suddenly start telling the truth.
@GeorgeGammon Both can be true. This isn’t as hard as you’re making it.
@GeorgeGammon I don’t know how to put it gently, without hearting you deeply, but world is big and complex, and many different things happening simultaneously in different places and moments. 🤷‍♂️

@Bongo_King1 @GeorgeGammon Russian tv say the army is there to kill all Nazis. 
By the way, all Russian media is controlled by Putin.
@GeorgeGammon Do most of these news agencies even have anyone on the ground over there?  Or are they reading twitter and facebook like everyone else?
